home.aboutText:
Junior Research Engineer based in Paris, France.

I create digital tools across IoT, web, and UX/UI, and explore visual storytelling through photography and video, often after a gravel ride
home.toolsSubtitle: Explore my collection of utility tools and applications.
home.footerBuilt: Built with <3 in Vue.js & Tailwind CSS

toolbox.title: TOOLBOX
toolbox.subtitle: A collection of useful tools and utilities for everyday tasks or not getting bored.

pdf.title: PDF TOOLS
pdf.desc: Compress, split, and extract pages from PDF files with ease.

tictactoe.title: TIC TAC TOE
tictactoe.desc: Bored in a line or in public transportation? Play the classic Tic Tac Toe against a friend or the computer.

flipcoin.title: FLIP COIN
flipcoin.desc: Need to choose between pizza or burger? Heads or Tails? Let fate decide with a coin flip.

rag.title: RAG CHATBOT
rag.desc: AI-powered document question answering with vector search and LLM integration.

toolbox.comingSoonText: More tools are in development! Check back soon for exciting new features.

gallery.title: GALLERY
gallery.subtitle: A curated selection of my photography. High-res images served via CDN. If you wish to use any photo, please contact me for permission but feel free to use the photos setting to guide you to take your best shot!
gallery.noPhotos: No photos yet. Populate public/gallery/index.json with image entries.

home.title: Creative Studio
home.subtitle: AI-assisted frontends, small tools, and photography projects.

hero.headline: Digital Studio prototyping personal projects.
hero.subtext: A small place focused on shipping useful tools, photography and sharing personal experiences.
hero.displayText: Every text displayed in the front

about.title: About the Studio
about.description: A space to design and build small tools, explore frontends design, and share photography.
about.contactText: Reach out for collaborations or project ideas.
about.creditsPhotos: All photos and videos showcased here are captured by me during my various adventures.
